bug.author: nithanda
bug.summary: Cannot join slack channel using invite link
bug.description:
Its same as this issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp/issues/1215>#1215</denchmark-link>
its closed but i am still facing the same issue.. i am trying to join using gmail but it says: "The email address must match one of the domains listed below. Please try another email." I used below invite link from the documentation here:<denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp>https://github.com/JohnSnowLabs/spark-nlp</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://spark-nlp.slack.com/join/shared_invite/zt-j5ttxh0z-Fn3lQSG1Z0KpOs_SRxjdyw#/>https://spark-nlp.slack.com/join/shared_invite/zt-j5ttxh0z-Fn3lQSG1Z0KpOs_SRxjdyw#/</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jdobes-cz>@jdobes-cz</denchmark-link> Did the link expire? We need to update all the links with a new one.
Dont see any updates on this.. please can you share new invite link that works?
